name: Bishop Walsh
comment: Newton fitness is great, always there with help and advise which you can trust to talk to. I can now train at home saving time whilst being more efficient.

name: Baldwin Mills
comment: Newton fitness has helped me feel more comfortable within myself and given me the confidence to eat better foods and train with my goals in mind.

name: Hayden Farley
comment: During my plan with newton fitness, I exceeded even my own expectations by losing 13lb and dropping 2 dress sizes from a size 12 to a size 8!
